english.segment1: My heart is steadfast. I will praise Your name with all my soul. Rise up and thank You. Lift my voice and awaken the dawn. I will praise You Lord among the nations. I will sing Your name in all the earth
english.segment2: (Chorus). Great is Your love. It's higher than the heavens. Your faithfulness reaches to the sky. Be praised, oh God. You're far above the heavens. Let Your glory fly all over the earth
english.segment3: Save us help us. With Your right hand You save the ones You love. Gives us aid against our enemies. The help of man will never be enough. With You we'll gain the victory. You will take down our enemies
english.segment5: I will praise You Lord among the nations. I will sing Your name in all the earth
